I saw this movie at a special screening last night. I was naturally skeptical going in, as I do not prefer effect-heavy films usually. This movie was a nice surprise. Everything was fluid and seemingly real. The film is obviously long, running approximately 2 1/2 hours, but the time goes by quickly. It's Cameron's best film besides Terminator 2. The political commentary is rather ''in your face,'' but if you go into it with the mind of having fun, you won't be disappointed. 4/5
